lines.text: It's a good scream. It's a good scream.
That's a terrible scream. Jack, what cat did you have to strangle to get that?
The one you hired. That's her scream.
You mean you didn't dub that?
I didn't hire her for her scream, Jack, I hired her for her tits!
I'm trying to save our asses!
I'll look after my *own* ass, thank you.
Yeah, I gotta go, but, um, whatta yuh say when you get outta here, we have a drink sometime... hmmm - in a glass?

[to Sally]
So you got your choice. You can be crazy or dead.
[he presents a couple of girls who all attempt a terrified scream]
But Jack, what's the matter with you?
No one wants to know about conspiracy any more!
Ya know, the only trouble I ever got into was when I was TOO careful!
